turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to place an order for pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi there, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, where do you want to order pizza from?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what would you like to order from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like three medium specialty pizzas of chicken barbecue with ranch drizzles on top, and I'd also like to add special instructions of extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, so you said 3 medium specialty pizzas of chicken bbq with ranch drizzled on top and extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $45 is your total. should i place the order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the order has been submitted. the pizzas will be ready in 45 mins for pick up.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope, that's it. Thank you. Bye.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you need help with anything else today?
